001package com.technototes.library.control;
002
003/** Command implementation of {@link Binding}
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 */
006public class CommandBinding extends CommandButton implements Binding<CommandInput> {
007    private CommandInput[] inputs;
008    private Type defaultType;
009
010    public CommandBinding(CommandInput... b) {
011        this(Type.ALL_ACTIVE, b);
012    }
013
014    public CommandBinding(Type type, CommandInput... b) {
015        super(null);
016        inputs = b;
017        defaultType = type;
018        booleanSupplier = this::get;
019    }
020
021    @Override
022    public CommandInput[] getSuppliers() {
023        return inputs;
024    }
025
026    @Override
027    public Type getDefaultType() {
028        return defaultType;
029    }
030}
